page.title: 04"Pick your own" at Elkstone.
page.content: The last few years have seen a great increase in the number of farms which offer their customers a "pick your own" service. Combend Farm at Elkstone is advertised as "Superpick" and offers a range of soft fruit and vegetables, available from late June to September. Strawberries and raspberries are the most popular produce, but picking can take a long time if you are not used to it. "Superpick" therefore provides ready-picked produce which might be cheating, but it doesn't make your back ache. Customers come from Gloucester and Cirencester and to make things easier for families the farm even provides a creche for small children.
